    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78478</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy released during nuclear fission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie freigegeben während der Kernspaltung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'énergie a libéré pendant la fission 
nucléaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia liberada durante o fission nuclear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia liberata durante la fissione nucleare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια που εκδίδεται κατά τη διάρκεια της πυρηνικής
διάσπασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La energía release/versión durante la fisión 
nuclear</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the energy released for the nuclear fission of uranium which split into caesium and rubidium of stable nuclei.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">caesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear fission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rubidium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stability</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">uranium</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Energie, die 
für die Kernspaltung des Urans freigegeben wird, die in Cäsium und 
in Rubidium der beständigen Kerne aufspalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre l'énergie libérée pour 
la fission nucléaire de l'uranium qui coupent en césium et rubidium 
des noyaux stables.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a energia liberada para o 
fission nuclear do urânio que racham no caesium e no rubidium de 
núcleos estáveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra l'energia liberata per la 
fissione nucleare di uranio che dividono in cesio e rubidio dei nuclei
stabili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί την ενέργεια που εκδίδεται
για την πυρηνική διάσπαση του ουράνιου που χωρίζει στο καίσιο και
το ρουβίδιο των σταθερών πυρήνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la energía release/versión
para la fisión nuclear del uranio que parten en el cesio y el rubidio
de núcleos estables.</string>
          </description>
